name: Video Voyeur # 2: "Far Away" Trivia Game | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Were Nickelback in their video for "Far Away"?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	No member of Nickelback acts in this video, but they are shown separately from the video's cast. The band is seen playing in a room filled with red and orange lights from a strobe light. The video is almost four minutes long.

questions.text: What are the man and woman doing in bed?
questions.explanation:
Reading the newspaper.

	When the video begins, the man is videotaping the woman while she's laying in bed. They are reading the newspaper when he gets a phone call.

questions.text: What does the man do for a living?
questions.explanation:
Firefighter.

	When the man gets the phone call, he goes for his fireman's uniform on the chair opposite the bed. The woman is clearly worried when he gets the phone call.

questions.text: How did the man and his buddies get to the worst part of the fire?
questions.explanation:
Helicopter.

	A friend picked the man up and they went to the fire together. When they put their gear on, the fire captain ordered him and several other men into a helicopter.

questions.text: What was the first channel on which the woman watched news of the fire?
questions.explanation:
Channel 5.

	The woman was still in bed when she turned on the TV and watched news coverage of the fire. The first channel she flipped to was channel five and then she flipped over to channel seven.

National park.

	When the woman was watching TV, the ticker tape at the bottom of the screen listed the fire as being in a national park. While battling the fire, one of the man's buddies was hurt and he pulled him to safety. Unfortunately, the helicopter they arrived in left without them.

questions.text: What was the couple's house number?
questions.explanation:
F961.

	The house number was seen when the woman opened the door to come out of the house the evening of the fire.

questions.text: What was the color of the shirt the woman had on when she left her house?
questions.explanation:
Pink.

	The night of the fire, the woman left her house and that's when her pink top and jeans were shown. While watching the fire in her bedroom, she was wearing a blue pair of pajamas.

questions.text: How many firemen lined up on the couple's front lawn the night of the fire?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	The woman left the confines of her house when she saw a truck pull up with some firefighters inside. It was raining when four firefighters lined up on the lawn of their home.

questions.text: Did the man in the video die?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The video made viewers think that the man may have died when it looked like a tree had fallen on him. He was the fourth man to line up on the lawn the night of the fire. The woman ran out of the house and hugged him.
